alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Baker, north central Union and east central Columbia Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Watertown to near Palestine Community. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, excessive cloud-to-ground lightning, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu, Winfield and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
